metadata.title: HAKI
metadata.name: HAKI 0001
metadata.description: A collection of 5,000 unique HAKIs built to go beyond the digital space that will unlock numerous benefits for our community, starting with our streetwear, NFT airdrops, live events, holders utility and much more as we progress through our journey! With HAKI, our goal is to build an organic community that will bring focus on most decisions for the project to shape and drive the project going forward. We plan to set goals that go beyond the NFT space and to set a top standard for the anime community.
